original_text: But when the assembly gathered in opposition to Moses and Aaron and turned toward the tent of meeting, suddenly the cloud covered it and the glory of the Lord appeared.
korean_text: 회중이 모여 모세와 아론을 칠 때에 회막을 바라본즉 구름이 회막을 덮었고 여호와의 영광이 나타났더라

sentences.original_text: But when the assembly gathered in opposition to Moses and Aaron
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 회중이 모세와 아론을 반대하여 모였을 때

sentences.original_text: and turned toward the tent of meeting
and the glory of the Lord appeared
